text: Sunflowers Interactive Entertainment Software is a German company that develops and publishes video games. It is in Heusenstamm, Germany. It was founded in 1993 by Adi Boiko and Wilhelm Hamrozi. Boiko is now president of the company and Hamrozi is chief executive officer (CEO). The company is known for the Anno series (also by Max Design), Knights of Honor (by Black Sea Studios) and ParaWorld (by SEK). ==List of games== The following is a list of games that have been created or published by Sunflowers: *Anno 1503: The New World *Anno 1503: Treasures, Monsters and Pirates *Anno 1602: By Royal Command *Anno 1602: Creation of a New World *Anno 1602: New Islands, New Adventures *Anno 1701 *Knights of Honor *ParaWorld *TechnoMage: The Return of Eternity *Holiday Island == Other websites == *Official Sunflowers website Category:Video game companies of Germany Category:1993 establishments in Europe
title: Sunflowers Interactive Entertainment Software
